title: BMCR11
description: Actual temperature is higher than set high band limit.(High Band limit = Set temperature + High band)
reasons_remedies: The temperature of the bottom heating plate is high (20 0C more than the set temperature).
Check the temperature set for the bottom heating plate.
Check the band value set for the bottom heating plate.
Check the temperature sensor of the bottom heating plate.
Check functioning of Solid State Relay (S.S. R).
Check with multimeter if SSR is giving output in off State. Replace SSR if output is avaliable in off state.
Check if thermocouple is connected properly.
Check if the deafult PID parameters are shown on machine as per below image.
text_for_embedding:
Error Code BMCR11
Error Code 11
Category: BMCR
Title: BMCR11
Alarm Message: Forming Bottom High Temperature
Description: Actual temperature is higher than set high band limit.(High Band limit = Set temperature + High band)
Reason & Remedy:
1. The temperature of the bottom heating plate is high (20 0C more than the set temperature).
2. Check the temperature set for the bottom heating plate.
3. Check the band value set for the bottom heating plate.
4. Check the temperature sensor of the bottom heating plate.
5. The heater is on continuously.
6. Check functioning of Solid State Relay (S.S. R).
7. Check with multimeter if SSR is giving output in off State. Replace SSR if output is avaliable in off state.
8. Check if thermocouple is connected properly.
9. PID parameters.
10. Check if the deafult PID parameters are shown on machine as per below image.
Visual References:
- Sealing screen
